channel.title: Brag About Yourself
channel.description:
This is the thread where you can brag about yourself. You may choose to talk about yourself in a way you can never be. If you must, be fictional, or whatever we won't know, if your being to TO bitchy and fake about yourself then the next person who posts can say something about it. So only one person can say something about it. We don't want a 50 on 1 dual here. xD This is meant to be funny, because it sounds funny and weird.
Let's start with me. - To smart for school - To cool for school - To buff for weights - To fast for flash - Neat0 and smexy. - Teddy Bear?
k, thx.
Your turn.

item.title: Brag About Yourself
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

i’m a good swimmer
i’m a good long distance runner (been doing it since i was 13 now almsot 17 :P)
i’m alright in skateboaring (and roller blading very good :p)
i love nature in the morning i spent about 5-6.30 in the soccer field just walking around and running (i got a soccer field, base ball field, tennis cords, basketball cord and like a gym in front of my house it takes me like 30 seconds to get there just across the small street)

i wana smoke but i don’t wana do it
i wana kill but i duno who to chose between my teacher and george bush
i wana smoke pot

Read full topic

This is the thread where you can brag about yourself. You may choose to talk about yourself in a way you can never be.
